text: Zhou is a Chinese name that refers to: *one of two dynasties in 1122 BC - 256 BC and 690 AD - 705 AD; *a political division in the modern-day country. It is also the Chinese word for "U. S. state". Zhou (å‘¨) is also a common Chinese surname. Famous people with that name include: *Stephen Chow, Hong Kong actor and director *Chow Yun-Fat, actor from Anna and the King and Bulletproof Monk *Zhou Enlai, People's Republic of China politician *Jay Chou, singer *Norm Chow, American football coach *Olivia Chow, Canadian politician *Zhou Yu, a great general of the Kingdom of Wu.
title: Zhou
